TestCase.TestCaseObjective: To check if deletion of objects within the data is correctly send from A to B.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: Remove an object from the test data created in 2101 at the TT. Transfer the data back to the TT using R/R. Check if the object is deleted. Do the same for another object but now with P/S. At the TT check if a notification is received indicating the deletion of the object.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: The nation and the TT are ready to connect and have a physical connection with each other. Also the SOAP connection is established and ready for transport. Dataset_2101 is loaded and transferred as described in test MIP4SLT2.5_2101.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success when objects are correctly deleted at the nations C2 system.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: The nation loads dataset_2101 into their C2 system (2) through the TT (1).
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Objects visible in the C2 system.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: An object is deleted at the TT (1).
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: The deleted object should disappear from the C2 system or be marked as deleted by producer

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: The data is transferred to the TT (1) through R/R.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: The data is received in the TT, resulting in a data file.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Compare the processed logged data at the TT (1) with the original dataset_2101.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: The object is deleted in both datasets. In this case the test is passed.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Delete another object at the TT (1).
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: The deleted object should disappear from the C2 system or be marked as deleted by producer.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: The data is transferred to the TT (1) through P/S.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: At the TT a notification has to be received indicating the deletion of the object.
